resources.string: Who is the fairest of them all?
Choose the right image size for your phone. Warning: large images need a lot of memory and could force the app to crash.

Developed by Lukas Furlan, supervised by Ao.Univ.Prof. Mag. Dr. Horst Eidenberger.

Used libraries: STASM 4.1 and OpenCV

TU-Vienna, 2014
Select how to visualize the facial features.

To begin with the App needs a photo of a face. The App detects the face and the facial features automatically and calculates a beauty score. The score relies on the golden ratio, as well as the symmetry of the facial features. A face is notably beautifull, if the face matches the optimal proportions of the golden ratio (1: 1,618) and is symmetrical.
2. Correct way to take a photo

The face needs to be recorded frontal without any tilt. The person should keep a neutral face expression - do not frown, do not smile. Just that way the App works correct and reveals something about the beauty of the face.
Most likely the App needs more processing power than your device offers. Under Settings you have the possibility to reduce the size of the images.
